verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon Samson עַזָּ֑תָה <S%H5804><s%> 'az-Za-tah; to Gaza וַיַּרְא־ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yar- and saw שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah ess זוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah, commit fornication וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha. to

לַֽעַזָּתִ֣ים׀ <S%H5841><s%> la-'az-za-Tim [And it was told] the Gazites לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> ba is come שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> shim-shOn Samson הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah, here וַיָּסֹ֛בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> vai-ya-Sob-bu hither And they compassed [him] in וַיֶּאֶרְבוּ־ <S%H693><s%> vai-ye-'er-vu- and laid wait ל֥וֹ lo כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הַלַּ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah for him all night בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> be-Sha-'ar in the gate הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; of the city וַיִּתְחָרְשׁ֤וּ <S%H2790><s%> vai-yit-cha-re-Shu and were quiet כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah all the night לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> or when it is day הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker In the morning וַהֲרְגְנֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> va-har-ge-Nu-hu we shall kill

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav lay שִׁמְשׁוֹן֮ <S%H8123><s%> shim-shOn And Samson עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi half הַלַּיְלָה֒ <S%H3915><s%> hal-lay-Lah night וַיָּ֣קָם׀ <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom and arose בַּחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> ba-cha-Tzi half הַלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, night וַיֶּאֱחֹ֞ז <S%H270><s%> vai-ye-'e-Choz and took בְּדַלְת֤וֹת <S%H1817><s%> be-dal-Tot the doors שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> sha-'ar- of the gate הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city וּבִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> u-vish-Tei and the two הַמְּזוּז֔וֹת <S%H4201><s%> ham-me-zu-Zot, posts וַיִּסָּעֵם֙ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-sa-'Em and went away עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- along הַבְּרִ֔יחַ <S%H1280><s%> hab-be-Ri-ach, with them bar וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and all and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כְּתֵפָ֑יו <S%H3802><s%> ke-te-Fav; [them] upon his shoulders וַֽיַּעֲלֵם֙ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lem and carried them up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- up רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh to the top הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, of an hill אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [is] before חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron. Hebron פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei- And it came to pass afterward כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen, this וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <S%H157><s%> vai-ye-'e-Hav that he loved אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a woman בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> be-Na-chal in the valley שֹׂרֵ֑ק <S%H7796><s%> so-Rek; of Sorek וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mah whose name דְּלִילָֽה׃ <S%H1807><s%> de-li-Lah. [was] Delilah

וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu came up אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> sar-Nei And the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru unto her and said לָ֜הּ lah פַּתִּ֣י <S%H6601><s%> pat-Ti unto her Entice אוֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וּרְאִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'I him and see בַּמֶּה֙ <S%H4100><s%> bam-Meh where כֹּח֣וֹ <S%H3581><s%> ko-Cho strength גָד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, wherein his great וּבַמֶּה֙ <S%H4100><s%> u-vam-Meh and how נ֣וּכַל <S%H3201><s%> Nu-chal [lieth] and by what [means] we may prevail ל֔וֹ lo, וַאֲסַרְנֻ֖הוּ <S%H631><s%> va-'a-sar-Nu-hu against him that we may bind לְעַנֹּת֑וֹ <S%H6031><s%> le-'an-no-To; him to afflict וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> nit-tan- him and we will give לָ֔ךְ Lach, אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish thee every one אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'Ah hundred כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [pieces] of silver

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said דְּלִילָה֙ <S%H1807><s%> de-li-Lah And Delilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, to Samson הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> hag-gi-dah- Tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na Please לִ֔י Li, בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> bam-Meh where כֹּחֲךָ֣ <S%H3581><s%> ko-cha-Cha strength גָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; me I pray thee wherein thy great וּבַמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> u-vam-Meh is and how תֵאָסֵ֖ר <S%H631><s%> te-'a-Ser [lieth] and wherewith thou mightest be bound לְעַנּוֹתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6031><s%> le-'an-no-Te-cha. to afflict

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- to her If יַאַסְרֻ֗נִי <S%H631><s%> ya-'as-Ru-ni, unto her If they bind בְּשִׁבְעָ֛ה <S%H7651><s%> be-shiv-'Ah me with seven יְתָרִ֥ים <S%H3499><s%> ye-ta-Rim withs לַחִ֖ים <S%H3892><s%> la-Chim green אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not חֹרָ֑בוּ <S%H2717><s%> cho-Ra-vu that were never dried וְחָלִ֥יתִי <S%H2470><s%> ve-cha-Li-ti then shall I be weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ti and be like כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> ke-'a-Chad and be as another הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam. man

וַיַּעֲלוּ־ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-lu- brought up לָ֞הּ lah סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> sar-Nei Then the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines שִׁבְעָ֛ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah to her seven יְתָרִ֥ים <S%H3499><s%> ye-ta-Rim withs לַחִ֖ים <S%H3892><s%> la-Chim green אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not חֹרָ֑בוּ <S%H2717><s%> cho-Ra-vu; which had not been dried וַתַּאַסְרֵ֖הוּ <S%H631><s%> vat-ta-'as-Re-hu and she bound בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וְהָאֹרֵ֗ב <S%H693><s%> ve-ha-'o-Rev, Now [there were] men lying in wait יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev abiding לָהּ֙ lah בַּחֶ֔דֶר <S%H2315><s%> ba-Che-der, with her in the chamber וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer And she said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha and שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon; [be] upon thee Samson וַיְנַתֵּק֙ <S%H5423><s%> vay-nat-Tek And he brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְתָרִ֔ים <S%H3499><s%> hay-ta-Rim, the withs כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יִנָּתֵ֤ק <S%H5423><s%> yin-na-Tek is broken פְּתִֽיל־ <S%H6616><s%> pe-til- as a thread הַנְּעֹ֙רֶת֙ <S%H5296><s%> han-ne-'O-ret of tow בַּהֲרִיח֣וֹ <S%H7306><s%> ba-ha-ri-Cho when it toucheth אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, the fire וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo was not נוֹדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> no-Da' was not known כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3581><s%> ko-Cho. So his strength

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said דְּלִילָה֙ <S%H1807><s%> de-li-Lah And Delilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, unto Samson הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הֵתַ֣לְתָּ <S%H2048><s%> he-Tal-ta Behold thou hast mocked בִּ֔י Bi, וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vat-te-dab-Ber me and told אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about כְּזָבִ֑ים <S%H3576><s%> ke-za-Vim; fail עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> hag-gi-dah- now tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na please לִ֔י Li, בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> bam-Meh how תֵּאָסֵֽר׃ <S%H631><s%> te-'a-Ser. me I pray thee wherewith thou mightest be bound

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha, to her אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If אָס֤וֹר <S%H631><s%> a-Sor unto her If they bind יַאַסְר֙וּנִי֙ <S%H631><s%> ya-'as-Ru-ni me fast בַּעֲבֹתִ֣ים <S%H5688><s%> ba-'a-vo-Tim ropes חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> cha-da-Shim, with new אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Sah accomplish בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem מְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah; been used וְחָלִ֥יתִי <S%H2470><s%> ve-cha-Li-ti then shall I be weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ti and be like כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> ke-'a-Chad and be as another הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam. man

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach therefore took דְּלִילָה֩ <S%H1807><s%> de-li-Lah Delilah עֲבֹתִ֨ים <S%H5688><s%> 'a-vo-Tim ropes חֲדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H2319><s%> cha-da-Shim new וַתַּאַסְרֵ֣הוּ <S%H631><s%> vat-ta-'as-Re-hu and bound בָהֶ֗ם va-Hem, וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer him therewith and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha and שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, [be] upon thee Samson וְהָאֹרֵ֖ב <S%H693><s%> ve-ha-'o-Rev And [there were] liers in wait יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev abiding בֶּחָ֑דֶר <S%H2315><s%> be-Cha-der; in the chamber וַֽיְנַתְּקֵ֛ם <S%H5423><s%> vay-nat-te-Kem And he brake מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from זְרֹעֹתָ֖יו <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'o-Tav them from off his arms כַּחֽוּט׃ <S%H2339><s%> ka-Chut. like a thread

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said דְּלִילָ֜ה <S%H1807><s%> de-li-Lah And Delilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, unto Samson עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- Up הֵ֜נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah Hitherto הֵתַ֤לְתָּ <S%H2048><s%> he-Tal-ta thou hast mocked בִּי֙ bi וַתְּדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> vat-te-dab-Ber me and told אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about כְּזָבִ֔ים <S%H3576><s%> ke-za-Vim, fail הַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> hag-Gi-dah tell לִּ֔י Li, בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> bam-Meh how תֵּאָסֵ֑ר <S%H631><s%> te-'a-Ser; me wherewith thou mightest be bound וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha, to her אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If תַּאַרְגִ֗י <S%H707><s%> ta-'ar-Gi, unto her If thou weavest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֶׁ֛בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' the seven מַחְלְפ֥וֹת <S%H4253><s%> mach-le-Fot locks רֹאשִׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi of my head עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַמַּסָּֽכֶת׃ <S%H4545><s%> ham-mas-Sa-chet. with the web
